title: A Boy on an E-Bike Hits a Pregnant Woman
summary: A 13-year-old boy was arrested after riding an e-bike that hit a pregnant woman in Poole. The accident happened on Herbert Avenue in January. The woman was hurt, but her injuries were not too bad. However, her baby was born very sick and is still in the hospital. The boy and another person on the bike left the scene after the crash. Police are asking people to share any information they have about what happened. This story shows why it is important to be careful when riding bikes and to help others in trouble.

background_read: This article is about a serious accident involving an e-bike and a pregnant woman. E-bikes are like regular bicycles but have a motor to help them go faster. Sometimes, people ride them without being careful, which can cause accidents. In this case, the rider was a young boy, and he left after hitting the woman, which is called a hit-and-run. The police are trying to find out more to make sure everyone follows safety rules. It is important to always be safe on the road and help others if there is an accident.
